projectGridLines.title: Customer Service Executive
projectGridLines.description:
Facilitates the onboarding of new customers.

? Prepare SBO’s/PI’s/ on the request of the sales team, while assisting when

it comes to inquires such as incoming stock and inventory in addition to

assisting with Tendering.

? Validates and executes orders in accordance SOP’s and timelines while

working closely with logistics.

? Coordinate with finance regarding customers credit limits, payment terms

and receivables from customers.

? Examining the incoming stock to plan the outgoing orders respectively

along with procurement.

? Escalate issues or stoppages that occur during the order or shipment

process.

? Identify and highlight complications and obstacles in the ERP system or

Processes for review and streamlining.

? Ensures the ERP system is updated of all necessary documents and

customer records accurately.

? Prepare ad hoc reports when necessary.

? Plan and oversee orders, while keeping up-to-date regarding customs and

customer requirements.

? Supervise region specific orders as designated by team lead.

? India Imports and exports along with Tenders

projectGridLines.title: Procurement Support Executive
projectGridLines.description:
1. Create/edit: Items, vendors, Purchase orders, and Blanket Purchase Orders,

in the ERP system.

2. Follow up with vendors to avail packing details, technical documents,

sample requirements and communicate regularly with respective teams.

3. Coordinate internally to expedite approvals at every stage.

4. Follow up with the supplier to get material in time and escalate to

procurement managers timely to address any bottleneck.

5. Follow up regularly with finance to ensure on-time payment to suppliers.

6. Prepare daily MIS reports for relevant work and review them with the

procurement manager.

7. Short close orders and maintain clean dashboards in ERP.

8. Review item/vendor master and block inactive items/vendors in ERP.

9. Preparing the production request form getting the approvals from manager

and coordinating with production team for processing the finished products.

10. Coordinating with the customer support team to get the Blanket sales order,

Sales order, Purchase requisition form.

11. Coordinating with the supplier and logistics to get the shipping schedule

and update the customer support team for the material readiness.

12. To coordinate and provide documents, and information from suppliers to

logistics and finance team if required for GRN and invoice posting.
